values:
And the world spreads its legs for another fuckin' star! 'Cause I am the all-American antichrist. I was made in america, and america hates me for what I am. I am your shit. You should be ashamed of what you have eaten. I'm a rock & roll nigger! Jimi Hendrix was a nigger Jesus Christ and grandma, too Brian Warner was a nigger! Nigger, nigger, nigger nigger nigger!

Outside of society is where I wanna be.
